description:
Observations to Hackney Council for 'Demolition of existing buildings and construction of a part twenty seven storey (Block A: Ground plus twenty six floors)and four storey (Block B: Ground plus three floors) building for use as a 343 room hotel (Use Class C1 including ancillary health and leisure facilities); flexible uses including 2,013sqm (GIA) of retail, bar and restaurant (Use Class A1/ A3/ A4) and 2,691sqm (GIA) of art gallery, gym and cinema/auditorium (Use Classes D1 and D2); and 6,179sqm of Office space (Use Class B1); together with ancillary hard and soft landscaping, cycle and disabled vehicle parking, revised vehicular
access/ egress and all other works associated with the development." (THIS APPLICATION IS ACCOMPANIED BY AN ENVIRONMENTAL STATEMENT)'.
